name: de.jochenheckl.unity.databinding
description:
Unity DataBinding brings data binding to unity game objects.

DataBinding is especially useful when generating complex user interfaces. With DataBinding you will always have your application logic separated from your User interface logic.

samples.description: A collection of simple scenes that demonstrate certain aspects of the data binding package.
The finished project you would have created when following the Getting Started Tutorial step by step.
A simple example demonstrating the use of DataBinding when using the new UIToolkit.
